item.sql: SELECT abd.abd_cus_number, abd.abd_area_id as id, abd.abd_area_name as name, abd.abd_area_type, abd.abd_area_level, abd.abd_parent_id as pid, abd.abd_2dmap_id, abd.abd_3dmap_id, abd.abd_seq, abd.abd_crte_time, abd.abd_crte_user_id, abd.abd_updt_time, abd.abd_updt_user_id, A.dept_ids, A.dept_names FROM com_area_base_dtls abd LEFT JOIN ( SELECT wm_concat(odd.odd_id) AS dept_ids, wm_concat(odd.odd_name) AS dept_names, oar.oar_area_id FROM com_org_area_rltn oar INNER JOIN sys_org_dept_dtls odd ON oar.oar_dept_id = odd.odd_id GROUP BY oar.oar_area_id ) A ON abd.abd_area_id = A.oar_area_id

INSERT INTO com_area_base_dtls( abd_cus_number, abd_area_id, abd_area_name, abd_area_type, abd_area_level, abd_parent_id, abd_2dmap_id, abd_3dmap_id, abd_seq, abd_crte_time, abd_crte_user_id, abd_updt_time, abd_updt_user_id ) VALUES ( :abd_cus_number, :id, :name, :abd_area_type, :abd_area_level, :pid, :abd_2dmap_id, :abd_3dmap_id, :abd_seq, SYSDATE, :abd_crte_user_id, SYSDATE, :abd_updt_user_id )

UPDATE com_area_base_dtls SET abd_area_id=:id, abd_area_name=:name, abd_area_type=:abd_area_type, abd_area_level=:abd_area_level, abd_parent_id=:pid, abd_2dmap_id=:abd_2dmap_id, abd_3dmap_id=:abd_3dmap_id, abd_seq=:abd_seq, abd_updt_time=SYSDATE, abd_updt_user_id=:abd_updt_user_id WHERE abd_area_id =:oldId AND abd_cus_number=:abd_cus_number
UPDATE com_area_base_dtls SET abd_parent_id=:id WHERE abd_parent_id =:oldId AND abd_cus_number=:abd_cus_number
UPDATE cmr_video_device_dtls SET vdd_area_id = :id WHERE vdd_area_id=:oldId AND vdd_cus_number = :cus_number
UPDATE cmr_camera_base_dtls SET cbd_area_id = :id WHERE cbd_area_id=:oldId AND cbd_cus_number = :cus_number
